Renuka Services and Technology Mumbai, IN
•Built an unsupervised time-series anomaly detection system using a TCN-based autoencoder, leveraging causal and
dilated convolutions to capture long-range temporal patterns.
•Implemented an end-to-end pipeline including normalization, sliding-window sequence modeling, reconstruction
error analysis, and statistical thresholding (mean + 3σ).
•Evaluated detection performance on the NAB benchmark using precision, recall, F1-score, and ROC-AUC, with

emphasis on reducing false positives in imbalanced data.
Projects
PlantGuard|Python, Scikit-learn, Pandas, NumPy, Streamlit, Matplotlib, SeabornGitHub
•Developed a Flask-based plant disease identification website using a ResNet-18 CNN trained on the Plant
Pathology dataset.
•Implemented deep learning–based image processing to accurately classify plant diseases from user-uploaded images.
•Preprocessed images, applied data augmentation, and trained the model, achieving 94% test accuracy.

coding challenges.
•Added secure authentication, interview scheduling, and a dashboard for managing sessions and recordings.

Interview Prep AI|React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Google Gemini API, TailwindGitHub

•Enabled personalized sessions, question pinning, and custom notes for organized learning.
